org.hibernate.shards.session
Interface ShardedSession

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, org.hibernate.Session
All Known Implementing Classes:
ShardedSessionImpl
public interface ShardedSession
extends org.hibernate.classic.Session

The main runtime inteface between Java application and Hibernate Shards.
ShardedSession represents a logical transaction that might be spanning multiple shards. It follows the contract set by Session API, and adds some shard-related methods.

Author:
maxr@google.com (Max Ross)
See Also:
ShardedSessionFactory, Session

Method Detail

getSessionForObject

org.hibernate.classic.Session getSessionForObject(Object obj)
Gets the non-sharded session with which the objects is associated.

Parameters:
obj - the object for which we want the Session
Returns:
the Session with which this object is associated, or null if the object is not associated with a session belonging to this ShardedSession

getShardIdForObject

ShardId getShardIdForObject(Object obj)
Gets the ShardId of the shard with which the objects is associated.

Parameters:
obj - the object for which we want the Session
Returns:
the ShardId of the Shard with which this object is associated, or null if the object is not associated with a shard belonging to this ShardedSession

lockShard

void lockShard()
Place the session into a state where every create operation takes place on the same shard. Once the shard is locked on a session it cannot be unlocked.
